content:
Looking at the example here:https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#prefix
GET [base]/Observation?value=le5.4|http://unitsofmeasure.org|mg
GET [base]/Observation?value=5.4||mg
The Observation Resource doesn't have a search parameter "value". Only value-string exists, which is the closest. Can anyone confirm?
value-quantity when searching for numeric results - that looks like a typo on the search page. GF#13645

value-quantity when searching for numeric results - that looks like a typo on the search page. GF#13645

Thanks @Eric Haas
